tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE VirtualObjectsInventory (
	object_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	object_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	description TEXT,
	quantity INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE object_inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    object_id INT,
    scene_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (object_id) REFERENCES virtual_objects(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (scene_id) REFERENCES scenes(scene_id)
);

CREATE TABLE VirtualObjects (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE ObjectInstances (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  virtual_object_id INT REFERENCES VirtualObjects(id),
  ar_scene_id INT REFERENCES ARScenes(id),
  position_x FLOAT,
  position_y FLOAT,
  position_z FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_objects (
    object_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    object_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    object_type VARCHAR(50),
    object_size VARCHAR(20),
    object_color VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_scenes (
    scene_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    scene_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    scene_description TEXT,
    scene_location VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE object_inventory (
    inventory_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    object_id UUID,
    scene_id UUID,
    quantity INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);
